dcterms:description: A high-quality multi-turn dialogue dataset about daily life, consisting of 11,118 context-response pairs for training, 1,000 pairs for validation, and 1,000 pairs for testing.
dcterms:title: DailyDialog

dcterms:description: A multi-turn dialogue dataset from social media, consisting of 76,590 context-response pairs for training, 17,870 pairs for validation, and 1,710 pairs for testing, providing options for textual and multi-modal knowledge utilization.
dcterms:title: DSTC7-AVSD
